name: Anagrams (Grandfather)
description:
A simple pixel-styled anagram game made using Godot Game Engine.

Instructions.
  • Select game mode
  • Combine the letters you're given to form as many words as possible before the time(top left) runs out!

I'm very open to suggestions you might have to improve user experience and would love to get feedback from whoever plays this!

 I'll be releasing versions for pc(Windows and Linux) real soon as well as one for IOS platforms. 

There'll be html5 version as soon as I figure out how to export for html XD.

Stay tuned!
